text: errumuttunnat eviteveccayalum ninnalavare ‎vadhikkuka. avar ninnale purattakkiyitattuninn ‎ninnalavareyum purantalluka. mardanam kealayekkal ‎bhikaraman. masjidul haraminatuttuvecc avar ‎ninnaleaterrumuttunnillenkil avite vecc ninnal ‎avareat yud'dham ceyyarut. athava, avar ninnaleatu ‎yud'dham ceyyukayanenkil ninnalavare vadhikkuka. ‎atan attaram satyanisedhikalkkulla pratiphalam. ‎
